description: L. D. Mithradewa and other Vs S. M. C. Gooneratne. Divisional Secretary of Thumpane and others before Hon. WICKUM A. KALUARACHCHI, J.
parties: L. D. Mithradewa and other Vs S. M. C. Gooneratne. Divisional Secretary of Thumpane and others
keywords: -Inquiry under Section 9 of the Land Acquisition Act regarding claims for compensation. -Referring a dispute between claimants regarding compensation to the District Court. -Unexplained Delay. -Presumption in terms of Section 114 Illustration (d) of the Evidence Ordinance.
legistation: -Article 140 of the Constitution. -Sections 7,9,10,17 of Land Acquisition Act. -Section 114 Illustration (d) of the Evidence Ordinance.
